parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The ARN of the report group to update.

parameters.name: exportConfig
parameters.description: Used to specify an updated export type. Valid values are: S3: The report results are exported to an S3 bucket. NO_EXPORT: The report results are not exported. exportConfigType (string) --- The export configuration type. s3Destination (dict) --- A S3ReportExportConfig object that contains information about the S3 bucket where the run of a report is exported. bucket (string) --- The name of the S3 bucket where the raw data of a report are exported. bucketOwner (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account identifier of the owner of the Amazon S3 bucket. This allows report data to be exported to an Amazon S3 bucket that is owned by an account other than the account running the build. path (string) --- The path to the exported report's raw data results. packaging (string) --- The type of build output artifact to create. Valid values include: NONE: CodeBuild creates the raw data in the output bucket. This is the default if packaging is not specified. ZIP: CodeBuild creates a ZIP file with the raw data in the output bucket. encryptionKey (string) --- The encryption key for the report's encrypted raw data. encryptionDisabled (boolean) --- A boolean value that specifies if the results of a report are encrypted.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An updated list of tag key and value pairs associated with this report group. These tags are available for use by Amazon Web Services services that support CodeBuild report group tags. (dict) --- A tag, consisting of a key and a value. This tag is available for use by Amazon Web Services services that support tags in CodeBuild. key (string) --- The tag's key. value (string) --- The tag's value.

nested_items.name: reportGroup
nested_items.description: Information about the updated report group.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the ReportGroup.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the ReportGroup.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the ReportGroup. This can be one of the following values:

nested_items.name: exportConfig
nested_items.description: Information about the destination where the raw data of this ReportGroup is exported.

nested_items.name: exportConfigType
nested_items.description: The export configuration type. Valid values are:
S3: The report results are exported to an S3 bucket.
NO_EXPORT: The report results are not exported.

nested_items.name: s3Destination
nested_items.description: A S3ReportExportConfig object that contains information about the S3 bucket where the run of a report is exported.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the raw data of a report are exported.

nested_items.name: bucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account identifier of the owner of the Amazon S3 bucket. This allows report data to be exported to an Amazon S3 bucket that is owned by an account other than the account running the build.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path to the exported report's raw data results.

nested_items.name: packaging
nested_items.description: The type of build output artifact to create. Valid values include:
NONE: CodeBuild creates the raw data in the output bucket. This is the default if packaging is not specified.
ZIP: CodeBuild creates a ZIP file with the raw data in the output bucket.

nested_items.name: encryptionKey
nested_items.description: The encryption key for the report's encrypted raw data.

nested_items.name: encryptionDisabled
nested_items.description: A boolean value that specifies if the results of a report are encrypted.

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time this ReportGroup was created.

nested_items.name: lastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time this ReportGroup was last modified.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: A list of tag key and value pairs associated with this report group.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The tag's key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The tag's value.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the report group. This property is read-only.
